title: Determine if parabola
text: If both the $$x$$ and the $$y$$ values or an equation are squared, the equation is not a parabola.
speech: If both the  x  and the  y  values or an equation are squared, the equation is not a parabola.
pacedSpeech: values or an equation are squared, the equation is not a parabola.

title: Answer
text: Therefore, the equation is not a parabola.
speech: Therefore, the equation is not a parabola.
pacedSpeech: Therefore, the equation is not a parabola.
